nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content: ### Use this to get all your contacts ðŸ‘‰

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
All these nodes take the API rate limits and pagination into consideration.

This allows you to:
- always get all the data from your account
- perform many requests without reaching the rate limit

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
### Use this to get only the contacts that have a certain tag ðŸ‘‰

To filter by more than one tag, just add more tag IDs to the tags parameter, like this:

1012751,1012529

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Systeme | Add contact
nodes.notes: This httpRequest node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
### Use this to add many contacts at once ðŸ‘‰

Adding thousands of contacts can be tricky, specially if you have many fields to add.

This node is an alternative to the native import functionality from Systeme.io.

If you need some custom data added to your leads, maybe using the API will be better than using the import tool they provide in Systeme.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Httprequest Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Httprequest Workflow. This workflow integrates 4 different services: splitOut, httpRequest, stopAndError, stickyNote. It contains 20 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 20
- **Node Types**: 4
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Systeme | Get all contacts**: httpRequest
- **Split Out2**: splitOut
- **Systeme | Get All tags**: httpRequest
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **Split Out3**: splitOut
- **Systeme | Get contacts with tag**: httpRequest
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- ... and 10 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
